rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The EU will sign a contract on Tuesday to secure over 40 million doses of a preventative avian flu vaccine for 15 countries with the first shipments heading to Finland, EU officials said on Monday.
